search.query: (index=windows) (sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:System EventID=7045 OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4697) | timechart span=1h count

(index=windows) (sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:System EventID=7045 OR sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4697) | eval cmd=coalesce(Message,_raw) | search cmd="*PSEXESVC*" OR cmd="*psexec*" OR cmd="*\\\\ADMIN$*" | table _time host user cmd | sort - _time
